00114 Erlang::Erlang( double mean, double variance )
00115   : pMean( mean ), pVariance( variance )
00116 {
00117     setState( );

00121 //========================================================================
00168 Erlang::Erlang( double mean, double variance, RNG& r )
00169   : RandomVar< double >( r ), pMean( mean ), pVariance( variance )
00170 {
00171     setState( );
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 // Calculates the distribution's order "k" and the distribution's
00176 // scale factor "alpha" from the stored mean value and the
00177 // variance. "k" will always be an integer value greater than or equal
00178 // to "1" and "alpha" will always be a double value greater than
00179 // zero. For the default values "mean = 0" and "variance = 1"
00180 // you will get "k = 1" and "alpha = 0.5".
00181 // Change: 2002-04-16, ra:
00182 // If the mean value is less than or equal to zero, the scale
00183 // factor "alpha" will be set to "0.5" now.
00184 //
00185 void Erlang::setState( )
00186 {
00187     pK = unsigned( pMean * pMean / pVariance + 0.5 );
00188     if( pK == 0 ) pK = 1;
00189     if ( pMean > 0 ) pA = pK / pMean;
00190     else pA = 0.5;
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 
00195 //========================================================================
00225 double Erlang::operator( )( unsigned k, double a )
00226 {
00227     double prod = 1;
00228 
00229     if ( k == 0 || a <= 0 ) return 0.;
00230 
00231     while( k-- )
00232         prod *= rng( );
00233 
00234     return -log( prod ) / a;
00235 }
00236 
00237 
00238 //========================================================================
00272 double Erlang::operator( )( )
00273 {
00274     return operator( )( pK, pA );
00275 }
00276 
00277 
00278 //========================================================================
00316 double Erlang::p( const double& x ) const
00317 {
00318     if ( pK == 0 || pA <= 0 || x < 0 ) return 0.;
00319 
00320     return pow( ( static_cast< double >( pK ) * pA ), static_cast< double >( pK ) ) * pow( x, static_cast< double >( pK - 1 ) ) * exp( - static_cast< double >( pK ) * pA * x );
00321 }
